title: What we do
subtitle:
We are committed to providing people with different disabilities with the best life possible.
We support families to build satisfaction and happiness for them, to held a helping hand to those who
need our help.
We are very proud of the numerous positive reviews and commentaries from people we have helped.
Regardless of what physical or learning disability people have, they will be provided with fun and
maximum satisfaction.

title: Why we need you
subtitle:
By joining Dorsetâ€™s Disability Charity you can assist Diverse Abilities in supporting over 600 people
with disabilities in Dorset, and their families.
Our supporters are very valuable to us and are important to the durability of the charity and help for
people with disabilities in Dorset.
By joining Diverse Abilities, you will get to know that you are changing the lives of hundreds of adults
and children with disabilities in Dorset.
Find out how to join us today and you will have a great opportunity to help us change many needed
lives in Dorset.

title: Try indoor skydiving today!
subtitle:
Indoor skydiving is the alternative analog designed to make you feel a real freefall. Our wind tunnel
will turn your dream of flight to reality. Come try with us!
